property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, if you're the monarch, put a +1/+1 counter on Throne Warden.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Rulers come and go, but my allegiance belongs to the throne."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Palace Sentinels enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One who ruled willing subjects would need no such protection." - Adriana, Captain of the Guard

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. If a player does, creatures that player controls can't attack you or planeswalkers you control until your next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Orzhov care not for repentance, only repayment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Palace Jailer enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. When Palace Jailer enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until an opponent becomes the monarch.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Recruiter of the Guard enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card with toughness 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Before a cause can have supporters, it has to have a voice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Custodi Soulbinders enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the number of other creatures on the battlefield. {2}{W}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Custodi Soulbinders: Create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Selfless Squire enters the battlefield, prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Whenever damage that would be dealt to you is prevented, put that many +1/+1 counters on Selfless Squire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Protector of the Crown enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to Protector of the Crown instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I gladly offer my weapon and my life to the glory of my sovereign."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more creatures attack, you may have target attacking creature gain double strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The best techniques outlive their creators.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player sacrifices an attacking creature. You create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is that creature's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Greed, rage, and bloodlust all lead to death at the hands of those who keep their heads." - Sergeant Eyra

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Sanctum Prelate enters the battlefield, choose a number. Noncreature spells with mana value equal to the chosen number can't be cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These halls are sacred. You will be silent."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target Equipment, then create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token and attach that Equipment to it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even your blade knows who will triumph here." - Atraxa, Praetors' Voice

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash You may have Stunt Double enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No duelist is without equal in Paliano.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, create a token that's a copy of that creature except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. Then exile all other tokens created with Faerie Artisans.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Keeper of Keys enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you're the monarch, creatures you control can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the right price, he'll unlock your path to the throne.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Deepglow Skate enters the battlefield, double the number of each kind of counter on any number of target permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its graceful glide paints the ocean floor with strokes of luminescence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, if you're the monarch, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Marchesa's poison is delivered by more than daggers." - Adriana, Captain of the Guard

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch When Thorn of the Black Rose enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If bribery and intimidation fail, Marchesa turns to her favorite form of bureaucracy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of counters on that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To spend your life seeking, only to find regret upon achieving ... this is the most delicious irony of all." - Leshrac, Walker of Night

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Marchesa's Decree enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, that creature's controller loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who seize power must have the means to hold it." - Queen Marchesa

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{B}, {T}, Exile Magus of the Will: Until end of turn, you may play lands and cast spells from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "These eyes have shown me the flaws of flesh."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Custodi Lich enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. Whenever you become the monarch, target player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Keeping order is a task too important to relinquish in death." - Abrado, Custodi priest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player casts a spell, put a spite counter on Curse of Vengeance. When enchanted player loses the game, you gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of spite counters on Curse of Vengeance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant permanent When Frenzied Fugue enters the battlefield and at the beginning of your upkeep, gain control of enchanted permanent until end of turn. Untap that permanent. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Forever after, she lived in fear of the madness reclaiming her.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike At the beginning of each opponent's end step, that player creates a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with "Creatures you control attack each combat if able."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Infiltrate and infuriate!" - Goblin Espionage League motto

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste At the beginning of each player's end step, if no creatures attacked this turn, put a fury counter on Charging Cinderhorn. Then Charging Cinderhorn deals damage equal to the number of fury counters on it to that player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {5}{R}, Exile Runehorn Hellkite from your graveyard: Each player discards their hand, then draws seven cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Inscribed with runes that predate the dragon, its horns possess their own ancient magic.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Skyline Despot enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you're the monarch, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, choose one - • Goad target creature that player controls. • Exile the top card of that player's library. Until end of turn, you may cast that card and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Subterranean Tremors deals X damage to each creature without flying. If X is 4 or more, destroy all artifacts. If X is 8 or more, create an 8/8 red Lizard creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {X}{G}{G}{G}: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) As long as Domesticated Hydra is monstrous, it has trample.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, put three +1/+1 counters on target creature you control and three +1/+1 counters on target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Survival is a constant competition from which both sides can benefit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature your opponents control. When Primeval Protector enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The earth shook in support of their cause, offering a champion of its own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{G}{G}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Splitting Slime becomes monstrous, create a token that's a copy of Splitting Slime. (The token has no counters and isn't monstrous.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample, indestructible Whenever another creature you control attacks, it gains trample and indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pounding of his followers' hearts matched the beat of his hooves, and their voices echoed his bellows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap all creatures. Until end of turn, whenever a creature an opponent controls blocks, draw a card. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, its controller may draw a card if its power is greater than each other creature's power. {G}, {T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your hand, then discard a card for each card drawn this way. Basic landcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile up to two target artifacts and/or enchantments. Basic landcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.value: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste. Basic landcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Treacherous Terrain deals damage to each opponent equal to the number of lands that player controls. Basic landcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reyhan, Last of the Abzan enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever a creature you control dies or is put into the command zone, if it had one or more +1/+1 counters on it, you may put that many +1/+1 counters on target creature. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink At the beginning of your postcombat main phase, you may pay X life, where X is the number of opponents that were dealt combat damage this turn. If you do, draw X cards. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Melee (Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each opponent you attacked this combat.) Other creatures you control have melee. (If a creature has multiple instances of melee, each triggers separately.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My sword is pledged to the defense of this city, not to the throne or this usurper."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste Whenever an opponent casts their second spell each turn, draw a card. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}: Scry 1, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, draw a card. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beneath crashing waves lies an ocean of secrets waiting to be explored.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, vigilance Akiri, Line-Slinger gets +1/+0 for each artifact you control. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her bold movements are anchored in the careful precision of each rope.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast your first spell each turn, choose an opponent at random. Vial Smasher the Fierce deals damage equal to that spell's mana value to that player or a planeswalker that player controls. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch, haste When Queen Marchesa enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent is the monarch, create a 1/1 black Assassin creature token with deathtouch and haste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Whenever Silas Renn, Seeker Adept deals combat damage to a player, choose target artifact card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each player's end step, that player may draw a card if a player other than you lost life this turn. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "How does one become a self-taught genius? Naturally, it requires brains."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C} for each card you've drawn this turn. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She bears the greatest burden of all: that of knowing.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flanking (Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.) Creatures your opponents control without flying or reach can't block creatures with power 2 or less. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Tana, the Bloodsower deals combat damage to a player, create that many 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Bruse Tarl, Boorish Herder enters the battlefield or attacks, target creature you control gains double strike and lifelink until end of turn. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Ishai, Ojutai Dragonspeaker. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Through me, the Great Teacher's voice will rattle this world."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Other creatures you control get +1/+1. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Partner (You can have two commanders if both have partner.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each opponent can't draw more than one card each turn. Whenever you or a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm sure we can come to an arrangement."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance, haste As Saskia the Unyielding enters the battlefield, choose a player. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, it deals that much damage to the chosen player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance, deathtouch, lifelink At the beginning of your end step, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, draw a card. Each player may put a land card from their hand onto the battlefield, then each opponent who didn't draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Look what we fought for. Look what we built together."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Yidris, Maelstrom Wielder deals combat damage to a player, as you cast spells from your hand this turn, they gain cascade. (When you cast the spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Breya, Etherium Shaper enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying. {2}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Choose one - • Breya deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. • Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn. • You gain 5 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Create a 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token with defender. −1: You may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, destroy target artifact or creature. −6: Choose target artifact card in a graveyard or artifact on the battlefield. Create three tokens that are copies of it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [0]: Exile Kaya, Ghost Assassin or up to one target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. You lose 2 life. −1: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. −2: Each opponent discards a card and you draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Armory Automaton enters the battlefield or attacks, you may attach any number of target Equipment to it. (Control of the Equipment doesn't change.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With no flesh to tire or resolve to falter, the machines soon became the Academy's preferred trainers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Converge - Crystalline Crawler enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Crystalline Crawler: Add one mana of any color. {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Crystalline Crawler.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy all nonland permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fuses? We have more than enough! Now ... which one was it?" - Flearan One-Eye, goblin engineer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prismatic Geoscope enters the battlefield tapped. Domain - {T}: Add X mana in any combination of colors, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A shining symbol of Paliano's true ruler - ambition.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control. Put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With such great footsteps, everything is within walking distance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a nonland permanent you don't control, then each other player chooses a nonland permanent they don't control that hasn't been chosen this way. Destroy all other nonland permanents.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Eminence - As long as The Ur-Dragon is in the command zone or on the battlefield, other Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Flying Whenever one or more Dragons you control attack, draw that many cards, then you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash If an opponent would draw two or more cards, instead you and that player each draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is no justice when some profit and others go without."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Path of Ancestry enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target nonland permanent. Each player other than its controller creates a token that's a copy of it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Self-reflection is not without its perils.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: {U}, {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Mind: Shuffle your library, then exile the top X cards, where X is one plus the number of spells cast this turn. Until end of turn, you may play lands and cast spells from among cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'll show you what you truly desire."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control dies while Boneyard Scourge is in your graveyard, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, return Boneyard Scourge from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death arrives on tattered wings and stolen bones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, destroy target nonland permanent that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The justice of dragons demands more than just an eye for an eye.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose an opponent at random that Territorial Hellkite didn't attack during your last combat. Territorial Hellkite attacks that player this combat if able. If you can't choose an opponent this way, tap Territorial Hellkite.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Eminence - Whenever you cast another Vampire spell, if Edgar Markov is in the command zone or on the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Vampire creature token. First strike, haste Whenever Edgar Markov attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Goad all creatures you don't control. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample At the beginning of each player's end step, Crimson Honor Guard deals 4 damage to that player unless they control a commander.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The finest soldiers aren't worth a whit without a set of hands to lead them and a set of eyes to guide them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My liege will lead and I will follow - to the battlefield, to the grave, and beyond."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you gain protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.) Exile Teferi's Protection.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has haste and "At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy this creature. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and attach Shifting Shadow to it, then put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in a random order."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Whenever Wasitora, Nekoru Queen deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a creature. If the player can't, you create a 3/3 black, red, and green Cat Dragon creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a fierce foe, she would become one of Madara's greatest protectors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Whenever Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist attacks, each opponent can't block with more than one creature this combat. As long as Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist is tapped, no more than one creature can attack you each combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach Whenever Qasali Slingers or another Cat enters the battlefield under your control, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All things will crumble, whether by time or by force.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cats you control have protection from Rats. (They can't be blocked, targeted, or dealt damage by Rats.) At the beginning of your end step, target opponent creates a 1/1 black Rat creature token with deathtouch. Whenever a Rat dies, put a +1/+1 counter on each Cat you control.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: Spilled blood always begets more of the same.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Skip your draw step. At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. {B}, {T}, Exile X cards from your graveyard: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Kindred Boon enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {1}{W}: Put a divinity counter on target creature you control of the chosen type. Each creature you control with a divinity counter on it has indestructible.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature type. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal X creature cards of the chosen type, where X is the number of creatures you control of that type. Put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature type. For each creature you control of the chosen type, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature type. Destroy all creatures that aren't of the chosen type.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the end, the lights fade, the land withers, and only the dead and vile remain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Kindred Discovery enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Whenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few things are truly "lost" at sea.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Patron of the Vein enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls. Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, exile it and put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each 1 life you gained this turn. First strike, lifelink Pay 5 life: Put three +1/+1 counters on Licia, Sanguine Tribune. Activate only during your turn and only once each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I give my blood, my life, all I have in exchange for victory."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Herald's Horn enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creature spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast. At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card of the chosen type, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Whenever O-Kagachi, Vengeful Kami deals combat damage to a player, if that player attacked you during their last turn, exile target nonland permanent that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At his behest the Kami War began to regain That Which Was Taken.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Eminence - At the beginning of combat on your turn, if Arahbo, Roar of the World is in the command zone or on the battlefield, another target Cat you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Whenever another Cat you control attacks, you may pay {1}{G}{W}. If you do, it gains trample and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Eminence - Whenever another nontoken Wizard enters the battlefield under your control, if Inalla, Archmage Ritualist is in the command zone or on the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that Wizard. The token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. Tap five untapped Wizards you control: Target player loses 7 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instant, sorcery, and Dragon spells you control can't be countered. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand, if Taigam, Ojutai Master attacked this turn, that spell gains rebound. (Exile the spell as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {R}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. {1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Izzet Chemister: Cast any number of cards exiled with Izzet Chemister without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sounds of life beckon many a restless soul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a Gold token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same. (A Gold token is an artifact with "Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Jingling coins beckon many an eager hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player is attacked, untap all nonland permanents you control. Each opponent attacking that player untaps all nonland permanents they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Flavorful aromas beckon many a salivating maw.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Ramos, Dragon Engine for each of that spell's colors. Remove five +1/+1 counters from Ramos: Add {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G}. Activate only once each turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Mirror of the Forebears enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. {1}: Until end of turn, Mirror of the Forebears becomes a copy of target creature you control of the chosen type, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink When Bloodline Necromancer enters the battlefield, you may return target Vampire or Wizard creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The veil of death hides little from our kind."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ground bones, broken glass, and splintered shipwrecks make up the sands of his shores.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Balan, Wandering Knight has double strike as long as two or more Equipment are attached to it. {1}{W}: Attach all Equipment you control to Balan.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What weapon will you bear against one who's mastered them all?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace At the beginning of your end step, put a bounty counter on target creature an opponent controls. For as long as that creature has a bounty counter on it, it has "When this creature dies, each opponent draws a card and gains 2 life."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Whenever Kheru Mind-Eater deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles a card from their hand face down. You may look at cards exiled with Kheru Mind-Eater, and you may play lands and cast spells from among those cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Once during each of your turns, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard. If a spell cast this way would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Loss has no meaning here. You cannot take from those who have nothing."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player is attacked, you gain 2 life. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Good health beckons many a vigorous follower.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player is attacked, you draw a card. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Idle chatter becons many an attentive ear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Stalking Leonin enters the battlefield, secretly choose an opponent. Reveal the player you chose: Exile target creature that's attacking you if it's controlled by the chosen player. Activate only once.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Nazahn, Revered Bladesmith enters the battlefield, search your library for an Equipment card and reveal it. If you reveal a card named Hammer of Nazahn this way, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. Then shuffle. Whenever an equipped creature you control attacks, you may tap target creature defending player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{B}{B}: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) As long as Sinuous Vermin is monstrous, it has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Borderland Explorer enters the battlefield, each player may discard a card. Each player who discarded a card this way may search their library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into their hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {6}{U}: Monstrosity 4. (If this creature isn't monstrous, put four +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) As long as Skittering Crustacean is monstrous, it has hexproof. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.) Pay 3 life: Add {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everything comes with a price. Especially revolution." - Grenzo, dungeon warden

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Will of the council - When Custodi Squire enters the battlefield, starting with you, each player votes for an artifact, creature, or enchantment card in your graveyard. Return each card with the most votes or tied for most votes to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Entourage of Trest enters the battlefield, you become the monarch. Entourage of Trest can block an additional creature each combat as long as you're the monarch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dim resort to violence, for which the nimble prepare." - Leovold, emissary of Trest

property.name: Rules
property.value: Council's dilemma - Starting with you, each player votes for time or money. For each time vote, take an extra turn after this one. For each money vote, choose a permanent owned by the voter and gain control of it. Exile Expropriate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few things are more valuable than time or money - and Leovold has plenty of both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Council's dilemma - Starting with you, each player votes for wild or free. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card for each wild vote. Put those creature cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest into your library. You may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield for each free vote.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What was taken shall be restored." - Arathel, elvish queen

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Destroy target land or nonblack creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack unless its controller pays {3}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're not your friends; they despise you. I'm the only one you can count on. Trust me."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The more you pay for the lesson, the better you'll remember it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature you control gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A splendid talent, admired of all men! His folly lay in serving Cao Cao's power."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Huang Zhong, Shu General can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Virile in war, he kept the north in fear; His prodigies subdued the western sphere."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Return Lady Sun and another target creature to their owners' hands. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sister to Sun Quan and wife to Liu Bei, Lady Sun often felt her loyalty to both tested.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) Zuo Ci, the Mocking Sage can't be blocked by creatures with horsemanship.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.) Whenever Ma Chao, Western Warrior attacks alone, it can't be blocked this combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Draw a card. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lu Su served as an intermediary between the Wu and Shu kingdoms until Zhou Yu's death in 210, when he became Wu's supreme commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A man, and such a fool! I, a woman, will fight them for you." - Lady Zhurong to her husband Meng Huo, before leading an army against the Shu

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature gets +0/+2 until end of turn. Activate only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "...It was Pang Tong's boat-connecting scheme That let Zhou Yu accomplish his great deed."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sima Yi, Wei Field Marshal's power is equal to the number of Swamps you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sima Yi fought for four generations of the Cao family before his own grandson became emperor and united the three kingdoms.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Horsemanship (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with horsemanship.) When Cao Ren, Wei Commander enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cao Cao's cousin, Cao Ren was known throughout the three kingdoms as the fiercest of warriors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +X/+Y, where X is half the number of Forests you control, rounded down, and Y is half the number of Forests you control, rounded up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain 1 life and target opponent loses 1 life, and you decide whether to flip again. If you lose the flip, you lose 1 life and that opponent gains 1 life, and that player decides whether to flip again. Double the life stakes with each flip.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Pit Scorpion deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. +lt;I+gt;(A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the smallest nuisance can be the greatest pain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Plant Elemental enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice a Forest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put any number of target artifact cards from target player's graveyard on top of their library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Add X mana in any combination of {B} and/or {R}, where X is the sacrificed creature's mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Protection from black

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap target untapped creature you control. If you do, add an amount of {C} equal to that creature's mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Add X mana of any one color, where X is 1 plus the sacrificed creature's mana value. Spend this mana only to cast creature spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Whenever The Unspeakable deals combat damage to a player, you may return target Arcane card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rumors are horrifying; the truth is worse.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a land enters the battlefield, Zo-Zu the Punisher deals 2 damage to that land's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A savage cry with the power to shatter minds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, Exile a nonland card from your hand: Put four time counters on the exiled card. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from that card. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature that's a Barbarian, a Warrior, or a Berserker gets +2/+2 and has haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A massacre? It is a mercy we grant them. This way they won't freeze to death."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Add {R}{R}{R}. Splice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double strike Whenever Warren Instigator deals damage to an opponent, you may put a Goblin creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is always a rabble to be roused.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Gempalm Incinerator, you may have it deal X damage to target creature, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Goblin Goon can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player. Goblin Goon can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from red Elemental creatures you control get +1/+1. When Master of Waves enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/0 blue Elemental creature tokens equal to your devotion to blue. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tidal Courier enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all Merfolk cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. {3}{U}: Tidal Courier gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lonely Sandbar enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U}. Cycling {U} ({U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a flood counter on target land. That land is an Island in addition to its other types for as long as it has a flood counter on it. If you control a Merfolk, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You may want to hold your breath." - Kellyg, merrow aquitect

property.name: Rules
property.value: Red instant and sorcery spells you control have lifelink. Whenever a white instant or sorcery spell causes you to gain life, Firesong and Sunspeaker deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The peaks of Hurloon never fall silent.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, create a 0/2 red Dragon Egg creature token with defender and "When this creature dies, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying and ‘{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.'"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Commander ninjutsu {U}{B} ({U}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand or the command zone tapped and attacking.) Whenever a Ninja you control deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. Each opponent loses life equal to that card's mana value.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent taps an artifact for mana, gain control of that artifact until the end of your next turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Law of Givesies Backsies is respected by every noble pursuer of shiny things.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Constellation - Whenever Nylea's Colossus or another enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, double target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who seek my protection receive it." -Nylea, god of the hunt

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach When Whiptongue Hydra enters the battlefield, destroy all creatures with flying. Put a +1/+1 counter on Whiptongue Hydra for each creature destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Where'd all the birds go?" - Kaldrin, jungle sightseer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying As Sower of Discord enters the battlefield, choose two players. Whenever damage is dealt to one of the chosen players, the other chosen player also loses that much life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gyrus, Waker of Corpses enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the amount of mana spent to cast it. Whenever Gyrus attacks, you may exile target creature card with lesser power from your graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that card and that's tapped and attacking. Exile the token at end of combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your commander costs {1} less to cast for each time it's been cast from the command zone this game. Whenever your commander is put into the command zone from anywhere, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are precious few names that echo throughout the Multiverse.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent attacks, if they attacked you and/or a planeswalker you control, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You think they know we're here?" - Orlo, goblin raider

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Discard a card, then draw a card. If a land card is discarded this way, draw an additional card. −3: Return up to two target land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. −11: Destroy up to six target nonland permanents, then create six 2/2 green Cat Warrior creature tokens with forestwalk. Lord Windgrace can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: For any number of opponents, destroy target nonland permanent that player controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all who remember Urza do so with fondness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance, reach All creatures attack each combat if able. Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, put a +1/+1 counter on Thantis, the Warweaver.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She spins a web few can resist. Its sweet aroma sparks chaos in every heart.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Coveted Jewel enters the battlefield, draw three cards. {T}: Add three mana of any one color. Whenever one or more creatures an opponent controls attack you and aren't blocked, that player draws three cards and gains control of Coveted Jewel. Untap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Improvise (Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.) Reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put any number of artifact cards with mana value X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then put all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Balance: Each player chooses a number of lands they control equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Choose target commander that entered the battlefield this turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it if it's a creature and a loyalty counter on it if it's a planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: History is not delicately woven. It is hammered with fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland permanent card. You may put that card onto the battlefield. Then put all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you control three or more lands with the same name.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Guarded by cartographers, disdained by warlords, coveted by adventurers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. [+1]: The next spell you cast this turn costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control as you cast it. −7: For each artifact you control, create a token that's a copy of it. Those tokens gain haste. Exile those tokens at the beginning of the next end step. Saheeli, the Gifted can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste {U}{R}, {T}: Copy target activated or triggered ability you control from an artifact source. You may choose new targets for the copy. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {B}, Pay 2 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bloodtracker. When Bloodtracker leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Flee all you like. The further you run the more firmly I feel your heartbeat."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tuvasa the Sunlit gets +1/+1 for each enchantment you control. Whenever you cast your first enchantment spell each turn, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My people have always been here, and here we shall remain."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Crash of Rhino Beetles gets +10/+10 as long as you control ten or more lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the herd moves, so should you." - Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game. You may choose new targets for the copies. Create a token that's a copy of target artifact.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}: Untap Retrofitter Foundry. {2}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a Servo: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. {T}, Sacrifice a Thopter: Create a 4/4 colorless Construct artifact creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bestow {3}{G}{W}{U} (If you cast this card for its bestow cost, it's an Aura spell with enchant creature. It becomes a creature again if it's not attached to a creature.) Enchanted creature gets +4/+4. Whenever an enchanted creature or enchantment creature you control attacks, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game. Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, target enchantment deals damage equal to its mana value to its controller unless that player sacrifices it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who fail to respect power will soon be consumed by it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, double strike When Heavenly Blademaster enters the battlefield, you may attach any number of Auras and Equipment you control to it. Other creatures you control get +1/+1 for each Aura and Equipment attached to Heavenly Blademaster.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Scry 1, then you may reveal the top card of your library. If a basic land card is revealed this way, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Activate only if an opponent controls at least two more lands than you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creature tokens you control have haste. At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 2/1 blue Phyrexian Myr artifact creature token. Then you may choose a token you control. If you do, each other token you control becomes a copy of that token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more land cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token. {G}, Sacrifice three creatures: Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game. Each opponent sacrifices a creature. Each opponent who can't loses half their life, rounded up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Arixmethes, Slumbering Isle enters the battlefield tapped with five slumber counters on it. As long as Arixmethes has a slumber counter on it, it's a land. (It's not a creature.) Whenever you cast a spell, you may remove a slumber counter from Arixmethes. {T}: Add {G}{U}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Boreas Charger leaves the battlefield, choose an opponent who controls more lands than you. Search your library for a number of Plains cards equal to the difference, reveal those cards, put one of them onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Xantcha, Sleeper Agent enters the battlefield under the control of an opponent of your choice. Xantcha attacks each combat if able and can't attack its owner or planeswalkers its owner controls. {3}: Xantcha's controller loses 2 life and you draw a card. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Lieutenant - At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Each scar on its hide is a badge of honor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target permanent you own on the bottom of your library. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card that shares a card type with that permanent. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Retrace (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 8/8 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, you may tap target creature with power 8 or less." Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Geode Golem deals combat damage to a player, you may cast your commander from the command zone without paying its mana cost. (You still pay any additional costs.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Lieutenant - At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to creatures you control this turn. Other creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metalcraft - Whenever Vedalken Humiliator attacks, if you control three or more artifacts, creatures your opponents control lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 1/1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your end step, you may manifest the top card of your library. (Put it onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.) Exile a face-down permanent you control face up: You may play that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. Timing rules still apply.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Lieutenant - At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, each opponent loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zombies work best when they're fed appropriately, so it's prudent to let them eat on the job.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ravenous Slime can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. If a creature an opponent controls would die, instead exile it and put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to that creature's power on Ravenous Slime.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death eventually wiggles toward us all.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Untap each enchanted permanent you control. −1: Create a white Aura enchantment token named Mask attached to another target permanent. The token has enchant permanent and totem armor. −7: Mill seven cards. Return all non-Aura enchantment cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, then do the same for Aura cards. Estrid, the Masked can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you attack with one or more Zombies, draw that many cards, then discard that many cards. You gain that much life. {2}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return X target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield. Miracle {X}{B}{B} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile the top eight cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield. Until end of turn, for each nonland card type, you may cast a spell of that type from among the exiled cards without paying its mana cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance, menace Whenever Yennett, Cryptic Sovereign attacks, reveal the top card of your library. You may cast it without paying its mana cost if its mana value is odd. If you don't cast it, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She talks using riddles her disciples alone can unravel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch When Night Incarnate leaves the battlefield, all creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn. Evoke {3}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you've cast your commander from the command zone this game. You may choose new targets for the copies. Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Lieutenant - At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. That token gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those with knowledge are wise to listen to those with imagination.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash This spell costs {1} less to cast for each attacking creature. Trample When Ancient Stone Idol dies, create a 6/12 colorless Construct artifact creature token with trample.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Lieutenant - At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Doves and pigeons are too subtle. When I send a message, I want it to have some teeth." - Aeschel, royal diplomat

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Varchild, Betrayer of Kjeldor deals combat damage to a player, that player creates that many 1/1 red Survivor creature tokens. Survivors your opponents control can't block, and they can't attack you or planeswalkers you control. When Varchild leaves the battlefield, gain control of all Survivors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, haste As Emissary of Grudges enters the battlefield, secretly choose an opponent. Reveal the player you chose: Choose new targets for target spell or ability if it's controlled by the chosen player and if it targets you or a permanent you control. Activate only once.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Draw a card, then put a card from your hand on top of your library. −1: Exile another target permanent you own, then return it to the battlefield under your control. −6: Choose left or right. Each player gains control of all nonland permanents other than Aminatou, the Fateshifter controlled by the next player in the chosen direction. Aminatou, the Fateshifter can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Estrid's Invocation enter the battlefield as a copy of an enchantment you control, except it has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile this enchantment. If you do, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Enchanters add layer upon layer of complexity to the world around them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, they gain indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No single arrow can pierce an entire flock."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof Creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is ancient, immense, and irresistible.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink When Vengeant Vampire dies, destroy target creature an opponent controls and you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those who stood in my path now lay behind me."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Immortal Phoenix dies, return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their fires burn quietly, allowing the phoenixes to glide silently through the canyon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever Rampaging Brontodon attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each land you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not even the tallest tree stands a chance against the underside of a dinosaur's foot.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, lifelink When Militant Angel enters the battlefield, create a number of 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with vigilance equal to the number of opponents you attacked this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Inspired Sphinx enters the battlefield, draw cards equal to the number of opponents you have. {3}{U}: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace When Rot Hulk enters the battlefield, return up to X target Zombie cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, where X is the number of opponents you have.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Goblin Goliath enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to the number of opponents you have. {3}{R}, {T}: If a source you control would deal damage to an opponent this turn, it deals double that damage to that player instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent you have. Trample When Avatar of Growth enters the battlefield, each player searches their library for up to two basic land cards, puts them onto the battlefield, then shuffles.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A pangolin's scales are resistant to all sorts of damage and weaponry. Desire for them threatens to drive the pangolin to extinction.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This strange beast has the hide of a leopard, the howl of a dog, and the horns of an ox.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. −1: If you don't control a creature named Mowu, create Mowu, a legendary 3/3 green Dog creature token. −5: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of lands you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. −3: Draw two cards. −1[0]: Tap all creatures your opponents control. You take an extra turn after this one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Timber Gorge enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Near the Western Seas lies Mount Zhaoyao - a forest of stones that reaches the clouds, a bountiful land of wondrous treasures and strange animals.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Meandering River enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Clouds and mists cover the lake as though it were a dreamland. When the wind rises, the mists disperse, opening great vistas of rippling reeds.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not all enormous beasts are quick to anger.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These nimble sparrows, not often seen, delight in tricking the pangolins that wander the forest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Purple-Crystal Crab dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A precious shell without, a delicious taste within.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Welkin Tern can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It stops flying only as its life comes to an end.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vivid Flying Fish has flying as long as it's attacking. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The rainbow seen above the Great Lake of Cloud Dream just after the rain is nothing but the vivid-colored flying fishes' ritual dance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Nine-Tail White Fox deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It has waited a millennium just for you, and for a millennium will it watch over your descendants.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Earth-Origin Yak enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Deep in the Northern Mountains, the yaks linger silently, channeling the powers of the earth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control a Yanling planeswalker, Moon-Eating Dog has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most nimble of creatures, it chases the most sacred luminence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spirits of all the rivers and oceans came together as an unstoppable force, unleashing their fury as lightning and thunder.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Heavenly Qilin attacks, another target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It strides through the universe as though stepping on the stars, crossing freely between the celestial and earthly worlds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, you gain 1 life for each attacking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is said that Yinglong gave birth to the qilin and the phoenix, and after them, all the hairy and winged beings in the world. Thus it is known as the Ancestor Dragon.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dragon's Presence deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Ancestor Dragon appeared atop the clouds, amid shattering mountains and sundering earth." - Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A heaven-sent vision is like a lantern to guide the way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mystery lies beneath the haunting mists. Never stay where obscurity deepens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the swallows, I learned how to ride the winds to anywhere, and from my tears, I mastered how to harness the water."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return up to two target creatures to their owner's hand. Search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Mu Yanling, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you searched your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Interesting . . . This mortal being seems to have been blessed with Qilin's essence." - Mu Yanling's journal

property.name: Rules
property.value: {3}{G}, {T}: You gain 4 life. Activate only if you control a Yanggu planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The pale deer are believed to have lived a thousand years, the pure white five hundred more. Those who seek them would gladly wander the wilds forever for the merest glimpse of these sacred beings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Reckless Pangolin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A pangolin's power grows with its speed. Strike when you have the chance!" - Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Known for their glowing horn and stone-rattling roar, zheng are the fiercest predators in the forest. Few survived before Jiang Yanggu came.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The welcoming appearance of the Arrow Bamboo Forest masks its deathly hostility.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever Fire-Omen Crane attacks, it deals 1 damage to target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you can see it clearly, you're already on fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For reasons unknown to me, herds in the Arrow Bamboo Forest have become more and more agitated." - Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Mowu was wary that day, as though he sensed the danger ahead." - Jiang Yanggu's travelogue

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Breath of Fire deals 2 damage to target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library and graveyard for a basic land card and a card named Jiang Yanggu, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As my hands touched it, I realized that I had not found it - it had been leading me here."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its wings are a heavenly inferno that sets the world ablaze.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cleansing Screech deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Crackle" and "pop" are the most wondrous sounds.
